data.title: 69% Global Executives Predict AI Agents will Reshape Business in 2026, According to DeepL Research
data.description: The age of the AI agent has arrived. New research from DeepL, a global AI product and research company, reveals that 2026 will mark a decisive shift from AI experimentation to agentic automation with a majority (69%) of global business leaders expecting agentic AI to transform their operations in the year ahead.
data.keywords: DeepL, research company, global business, business leaders, global AI product, Japan, global operations, Jarek Kutylowski
